content: add a fashionable twist to sun protection with this crochet bucket hat brought to life with a luscious statement bow this topper is created in soft caron simply me fun and easy to create you ll practice chain stitch half_double_crochet single_crochet assembly and more pair it with shorts or a sundress to keep effortlessly cool this cute bowtique hat is a must-have for warm-weather days materials caron® simply me™ 5 64 oz/160 g 197 yds/180 m pretty in pink 86002 1 ball or 185 yds/169 m size one size to fit adult
